name: Red Hoard
description:
An endless runner with the limitation that you die every ten seconds unless you pick up a health object.

Built for the Ludum Dare 51 Jam using Bevy.

W to move forward, A and D to rotate. Pick up Blue boxes to reset your time, pick up a Gold Box to reset your time and activate a temporary mode that allows you to kill the red blocks.

You get a point every second you are alive, killing a red block gives you 5 points.

Try and get the highest score!
